abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a [L] Energy card and attach it to Electivire. This power can't be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Discard all [L] Energy attached to Electivire. Flip a coin for each [L] Energy you discarded. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
